text: The new restaurant has amazing food and excellent service! The ambiance is perfect for a romantic dinner.
Food was cold when it arrived and the waiter was rude. Will not be coming back.
The software interface is user-friendly and the performance is excellent. Great value for money!
Too many bugs and crashes. Customer support is unresponsive. Very disappointed with this purchase.
Hotel room was clean and comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful throughout our stay.
Overpriced for the quality provided. Room was noisy and the WiFi didn't work properly.
